author: rodiazet
content: Is someone interested in reviewing pairing precompile for BN254 curve? https://github.com/ethereum/evmone/pull/852

author: jwasinger
content: does an implementation of ecmul for bls (whether g1/g2) using GLV require a subgroup check?

author: jwasinger
content: obviously the precompiles are specced to require subgroup checks.  But does the GLV optimization require it?

author: mratsim
content: multipairing can also benefit from multithreading

author: mratsim
content: the discount being too steep matches my own benches, however BLST does implement the bucket algorithm and should be sublinear.
